>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<



>>===== RESULT =====>>
John Doe
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <names variable="composer">
        <name/>
		<label/>
      </names>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "composer": [
            {
                "family": "Doe",
                "given": "John"
            }
        ],
        "id": "ITEM-1",
        "type": "book"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
